DOC.brief_summary: Study volunteer require conduct home pregnancy test ( HPT ) trial centre provide sample urine void test . Volunteers complete product usage questionnaire leaflet comprehension questionnaire site . Follow-up information require volunteer additional urine sample ( ) pregnancy information establish true pregnancy status study visit .
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible volunteer recruit study provide inform consent . Volunteers test urine sample investigational HPT accord device Instructions use record result onto result sheet . A sample urine void obtain test study technician . The technician test volunteer 's sample second investigational HPT , professional use pregnancy test Clearblue Digital HPT , result use provide volunteer pregnancy test result . During technician testing , volunteer complete device usability leaflet comprehension questionnaire . At end study visit , volunteer provide material allow follow-up determination pregnancy status . The majority volunteer request provide one additional urine sample , collect 2 day study visit . If early pregnancy suspect volunteer request provide additional 7 daily urine sample follow study visit . All volunteer require provide detail pregnancy status ( document menses pregnancy confirmation health care professional ) study visit . True pregnancy status determine laboratory test clinical information . The study continue minimum 300 pregnant 300 pregnant volunteer complete study .
DOC.criteria: Female Aged 18 Willing conduct personal pregnancy test reveal pregnancy status Willing give inform consent Currently previously employ SPD Development Company Ltd. ( SPD ) , Alere , Unipath , Procter Gamble ( P & G ) , affiliate . Has immediate relative* currently previously employ SPD , Alere , Unipath P & G affiliate Previously use investigational HPT within last six month Healthcare professional ( HCP 's ) professional experience either use lateral flow base device conduct near patient test Confirmed pregnant healthcare professional beyond first trimester Taken hormonal preparation contain human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) last month , e.g . PregnylÂ®
